overview:
Olivia Franklin is a determined, strong minded designer with a strong skill set in visual communication and knowledge of interaction design. She brings valuable ideas and insights to enhance any project and she is dedicated to solving user problems. She has design experience for web, mobile (iphone, ipod, and android), and print (business cards, posters, logos, etc).

In 2008 Olivia graduated from Arizona State University with a Bachelors of Science degree in Design. While in school, Olivia worked for an Arizona design firm, Rain (Visual Strategy and Design). At Rain she worked on several website designs including Eddie V’s Restaurants and Pima County Schools.

At the tail end of her college career she took part in the Microsoft world-wide competition Imagine Cup. She was a finalist after two rounds with 59,000 students from 126 countries. The finals for this competition took place in Paris, France where her talents sparked interest with one of the judges.This interest lead to a job offer with Yahoo! Search.

At Yahoo!, she has worked on several high-profile projects including the re-design of the search page and Yahoo! Sketch-A-Search for the iphone.

Olivia specializes in web design, mobile design (iphone, ipod, android), branding and identity design, solving user problems, brainstorming and aiding in vision realization.

milestones.description: Worldwide finalist in Microsoft Imagine Cup Interface Design
Launched Yahoo! Search Direct as the Lead Designer
